backend_system.Entities

Class Event

  • java.lang.Object
    • backend_system.Entities.Event
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable

    public class Event
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable, java.io.Serializable
    The class Event represents a event with name and start/end datetime in this calendar system, and it also contains the alerts that are related to this event.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Creates a series of alerts according frequency that is in seconds.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the alert.
        dt - the first time and date of this alert.
        untilWhen - the last time and date of this alert
        temporalAmount - the time between two alerts in seconds.
